It's so much a part of your...
your life,

4391.text:
and almost what you are

...it has made us really quite bitter,

The question that's been important

I didn't want to be in that minefield

If I had taken us into the minefield,

"bloody hell, Graham."

35 years... I feel like a could just

And okay, you have your little

- can you see how things could get better?
